### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE population_genetics_data (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50),
  population_name VARCHAR(50),
  study_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE genetic_variations (
  variation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  variation_type VARCHAR(50),
  chromosome_number INT,
  position INT,
  allele1 VARCHAR(1),
  allele2 VARCHAR(1)
)

CREATE TABLE gene_features (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  gene_length INT,
  gene_description TEXT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE population_genetics_data SET species_name = 'Human' WHERE sample_id = 1;
